issues.description:
This contract forwards its call data via DELEGATECALL in its fallback function. This means that any function in the called contract can be executed. Note that the callee contract will have access to the storage of the calling contract.
 DELEGATECALL target: Concat(0, Extract(167, 8, storage_1))
issues.title: Call data forwarded with delegatecall()

issues.description: Be aware that the called contract gets unrestricted access to this contract's state.
issues.title: DELEGATECALL to a user-supplied address

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function fallback. The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
issues.title: Transaction order dependence
